1:
Save me, God, by your name,\q and judge me in your might.
\q
2:
Hear my prayer, God;\q give ear to the words of my mouth.
\q
3:
For strangers have risen up against me,\q and pitiless men have sought after my life;
\q they have not set God before them.
\qs Selah\qs*


\q
4:
See, God is my helper;\q the Lord is the one who upholds me.
\q
5:
He will repay my enemies with evil;\q in your faithfulness, destroy them!


\q
6:
I will sacrifice to you with a freewill offering;\q I will give thanks to your name, Yahweh, for it is good.
\q
7: For he has rescued me from every trouble;\q my eye has looked in triumph on my enemies.
